name: Kaiju Cooking
description:
Cook up some tasty treats for your kaiju babies in Kaiju Cooking!

Made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 42!

Gameplay

4 Players compete head-to-head to pummel the city for resources to feed their babies! Collect resources from the landscape or your opponents!

Team

Jeffalot - Programming
Moawling - Art Assets
Ninja_Ropes - Music/Sounds
FuShark- Character Design

Incomplete Features

There were several planned features that didn't make it into this version of the game, the plan is to polish up the game a bit and re-release with some more updates and additional TLC!

  • Attacking Not Fully Implemented
  •  Method for Cooking Resources at the Power Plant
  •  Additional Sounds and Music
  •  Title Card
  •  Character Select Screen
  •  Recipe Implementation
  •  Win Conditions
Controls Gamepads Also Supported! Player 1

Movement    ↑ ↓ ← →   Attack  |   Ctrl

Player 2

Movement    WASD    |    Attack    E

Player 3

Movement  TFGH    |    Attack    Y

Player 4

Movement    IJKL     |     Attack    O
